alert.note: Alert for Pipestone; Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 6:59PM CDT until May 30 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR LYON...NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN...NORTHEASTERN ROCK...NORTHERN NOBLES...MURRAY AND SOUTHERN PIPESTONE COUNTIES... At 659 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Minneota to near Camden State Park to near Chandler to near Rushmore, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marshall, Minneota, Ghent, Taunton, Camden State Park, Currie, Lake Shetek State Park, Cottonwood, Dovray and Tracy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
